description:
NTS Map: 082P04A paved / dirt path circles the storm water retention pond called Elliston Lake.
There are a number of these trails within the city of Calgary, this one - route 5, from the Book "Calgary's Best Bike Rides and Trails" by Lori Beattie. 
Submitted by S. Decarie
directions: East Calgary - 17th Ave and 60th Street SE
title: Elliston Regional Park - Calgary
